F319 VINDICATION
VERIFIED

POTS Diagnosis Explicitly Refuted by Cardiologist

Cardiologist explicitly states: 'You were previously labelled as POTS, but the test did not show this.' POTS was applied as a LABEL without confirmatory testing.

View Details
F323 FND/SOMATOFORM
VERIFIED

Never Reviewed by FND Team at St George's

Dr Simeoni explicitly documents: 'Has never been reviewed by the FND team at St George's.' FND label appeared in records without formal assessment.

View Details
F324 CAUSATION
VERIFIED

Pregabalin Cessation → Seizure Causation Documented

Dr Simeoni documented: 'When had a seizure pregabalin had been stopped abruptly.' Direct documentation of causal link.

View Details
F325 VINDICATION
VERIFIED

Baclofen 90% Effective for Tremor

Dr Simeoni documented: 'with 10 mg the tremor solves 90%.' Baclofen (GABAergic muscle relaxant) achieved 90% resolution.

View Details
F334 BREACH
VERIFIED

GP Stopped OxyContin Unsafely - Seizure Risk

Pain Clinic explicitly documented: 'abruptly stopping oxycontin is unsafe as the patient is at risk of seizures and is at high risk of Withdrawal.'

F337 VINDICATION
VERIFIED

Dr Karunaratne: 'Today was the first time he sounded somewhat positive in a very long time. This is largely due to the fact that medical explanations have been found for symptoms that he has been experiencing for a long time.'

F344 BREACH
VERIFIED

Pain Referral Rejected Citing Suicide Concern

Dr Bhaskar rejected pain referral stating: 'if a patient is feeling vulnerable to the point of self-harm, I think it is not advisable to review this patient in the Pain clinic.' 10 weeks before seizure.

View Details
F347 BREACH
VERIFIED

Neurospine Discharge - Wrong Area Imaged

Mr Hassany: 'the MRI scan findings does not explain his severe back pain... no surgical target.' Patient discharged because LUMBAR MRI was normal. THORACIC spine (fracture location) was not imaged until 8 months later.

View Details
F354 VINDICATION
VERIFIED

Formal Epilepsy Diagnosis

Dr Karunaratne formally diagnosed: 'Epilepsy with generalised seizures.' Not functional/dissociative seizures.

View Details
F356 VINDICATION
VERIFIED

Vascular Surgeon Lists Formal Diagnoses - Organic Conditions Confirmed

Vascular surgeon Mr Aaron Goh's formal diagnosis list includes: Epilepsy (NOT NEAD/FND), T5-T8 fractured vertebrae and ribs (confirmed), EDS/Hypermobility, Tremor of UNKNOWN AETIOLOGY (NOT labelled functional).

View Details
F357 VINDICATION
VERIFIED

MRA Confirms Subclavian Compression and Stenosis

MRA imaging confirms 'compression of the subclavian vein on the left as well as a focal stenosis of the left subclavian artery' in the subclavicular space.

F358 QUANTUM
VERIFIED

Symptom Severity: Patient Would Prefer Amputation

Vascular surgeon documents extreme symptom severity: patient 'would rather his arm be amputated due to the discomfort'.

F-GEM-006 MEDICATION
VERIFIED

The 'Mathematical Entrapment' (Oramorph)

GPs restricted Oramorph to 20ml/day (15-day supply) despite Pain Clinic authorization for 30ml/day (10-day supply). Created calculated gap where patient ran out on Day 10, allowing false 'addiction' labelling.

View Details
F002 DISCREPANCY
VERIFIED

2020 MH1 Referral Contains Somatisation Framing

GP referral to adult secondary mental health services includes narrative stating patient presents with symptoms 'hard to explain,' references brother's suicide, and explicitly links to 'somatisation.' Exists as contemporaneous written artefact predating seizure/fractures by over a year.

View Details
F010 FABRICATION
SUPPORTED

Weaponisation of Brother's Suicide

Dorian Thomson died by suicide in 2011 after years of dismissed EDS chronic pain. Healthcare providers subsequently weaponised this family tragedy to justify psychiatric dismissal of John's physical symptoms, despite objective evidence of mechanical pathology.

View Details
F020 WITNESS
VERIFIED

Dr Karunaratne 'Data Manipulation' Statement

NHS epilepsy specialist Dr Kushan Karunaratne verbally used the phrase 'data manipulation' when discussing GP care issues, with patient's parents present as witnesses.

View Details
F022 WITNESS
VERIFIED

MSK Physio 'Attention Seeking' Documentation

Independent MSK physiotherapist documented: 'issues with GP, as they did not believe his pain and accused him for attention seeking' - PREDATES December 2021 seizure and fractures. Also documented 'pain not controlled since 2016.'

View Details
F023 WITNESS
VERIFIED

Ambulance ePCR Corroborates 23 Dec 2021 Seizure

London Ambulance Service ePCR documents a witnessed tonic-clonic seizure at home on 23 Dec 2021, including call/scene/hand-over timings, post-ictal confusion, and recovery to GCS 15.

View Details
F027 WITNESS
VERIFIED

Pain Clinic Rejected Referral Without Patient Consultation

Independent MSK physiotherapist documented Pain Clinic REJECTED patient's referral because mother mentioned low mood/suicide concern. Patient was NEVER spoken to directly before discharge. 30 DAYS BEFORE the 23 December 2021 seizure.

View Details
F030 VINDICATION
VERIFIED

Dr Gorrie Removes Somatoform Diagnosis

Dr Alexander Gorrie marked the Somatoform Pain Disorder diagnosis as INACTIVE on 22 July 2025, noting 'there were clear causes for his pain.' Highly unusual to remove without formal psychiatric reassessment - error was self-evident.

View Details
F031 VINDICATION
VERIFIED

Pain Clinic Refutes Somatoform

Pain Clinic explicitly disagreed with somatoform characterisation. GP record states: 'GP prev told somatic, pain clinic at C&W; felt not somatic.'

View Details
F032 VINDICATION
VERIFIED

2019 Duplex Ultrasound Shows TOS-Positive Result

Bilateral upper-limb arterial duplex study recorded complete cessation of flow within the distal subclavian artery during Adson's and EAST manoeuvres bilaterally. Conclusion: 'Marked haemodynamic changes… a positive result.'

View Details
F033 VINDICATION
VERIFIED

2024 UCLH MR Reports Dynamic Subclavian Compression

UCLH MR thoracic inlet/outlet report describes compression of left subclavian artery and vein with arms abducted, including apparent focal stenosis.

View Details
F036 VINDICATION
VERIFIED

US Doppler June 2025 Shows Dynamic Bilateral Subclavian Occlusion

Royal Free ultrasound Doppler documents dynamic vascular compression. Both arms at 90° abduction: subclavian veins 'compressed with no flow'. Right arm in Surrender position: both artery and vein 'compressed with no flow detected'.

View Details
F038 VINDICATION
VERIFIED

Psychiatric Assessment Clearance

Psychiatric assessment by Dr Gupta found NO: PTSD, depression, psychosis, personality disorder, OR somatisation disorder. Presentation consistent with inadequately treated physical illness.

View Details
F040 BREACH
VERIFIED

Somatoform Diagnosis Without Assessment

Dr Bulale Ali applied Somatoform Pain Disorder during a telephone consultation about switching opioid medication - NOT a psychiatric assessment. Patient was never informed. Applied AFTER MRI had proven T5-T8 fractures.

View Details
F041 BREACH
VERIFIED

10-Month Fracture Diagnostic Delay

T5-T8 vertebral fractures from December 2021 seizure were not diagnosed until UCLH MRI on 16 October 2022 - approximately 10-month delay. Initial A&E assessment dismissed injury as 'soft tissue.' NICE NG59 red flags were present.

View Details
F042 BREACH
VERIFIED

Pregabalin Reduction Contrary to BNF

Pregabalin reduced from 600mg to 100mg daily between 18-20 October 2021 without proper tapering protocol. BNF mandates gradual withdrawal. Occurred ~10 weeks before December 2021 seizure.

View Details
F043 BREACH
VERIFIED

Pain Clinic Rejected Referral; Advised Psychiatrist

Pain Medicine correspondence states patient 'would not benefit from a referral to secondary care services.' Letter includes guidance re suicide risk referral to psychiatry. 10 weeks before December 2021 seizure.

View Details
F044 BREACH
VERIFIED

Dr Morgan 'Opiate Addiction' Label Without Testing

Dr Sian Morgan stated 'main issue here is opiate addiction' with NO toxicology or formal addiction assessment documented.

View Details
F050 CAUSATION
VERIFIED

Sleep Deprivation → Seizure → Fracture Chain

Causation chain: Undertreated back pain → Inability to lie flat → 14+ months sleep deprivation → Lowered seizure threshold → Tonic-clonic seizure 23 Dec 2021 → T5-T8 vertebral fractures.

View Details
F119 NEUROLOGICAL
VERIFIED

Third-Degree Burn Without Sensation

Patient sustained third-degree burn with blistering from hot water bottle over 4-day period WITHOUT FEELING PAIN OR HEAT. GP documented but NO REFERRAL for sensory loss investigation.

View Details
F125 NEUROLOGICAL
VERIFIED

Pattern of Neurological Symptoms Never Investigated

Documented symptoms: urinary retention, post-micturition dribble, erectile dysfunction, two thermal burns from sensory loss, perianal/buttock symptoms, severe back pain. Despite constellation, comprehensive neurological workup NEVER performed.

View Details

VERIFIED

Dr Karunaratne documented 'Has been sleep deprived for last 14 months' at first epilepsy assessment. Acute trigger 'Week running up to event had one night of no sleep.'

VERIFIED

Karunaratne Letter 2 Days Pre-Somatoform Documents Physical Symptoms

Two days before Somatoform applied (05/01/2023), Dr Karunaratne documented: 'Pain remains a major concern,' patient 'needs to prop himself against a wall' to sleep, MRI spine completed, skull surgery scheduled. No psychiatric concerns raised.

Evidence Status Key

VERIFIED - Confirmed by independent documentary evidence
SUPPORTED - Consistent with evidence but not definitively proven
CONTRADICTED - Evidence disproves this claim

Finding Categories

VINDICATION

Independent clinicians refuting problematic diagnoses

BREACH

Potential Bolam/Bolitho breach of duty

DISCREPANCY

GP entries contradicting contemporaneous evidence

WITNESS

Third-party corroboration of events

CAUSATION

Evidence linking breach to harm

QUANTUM

Damages evidence

PROCEDURAL

Administrative/data protection issues

Case strategy insights
